about_the_game:
🌟 Winner In Life: Free Leisure Collection Game 🌟


Game features:
  • The treasure chest : Every two minutes, you will receive a mysterious treasure chest. Opening it will randomly give you a beautiful pearl which can be traded in the community!
  • Pearl Upgrade : 4 identical pearls can be combined to create a higher-level pearl, making your collection more diverse.
  • Level Description : There are a total of 26 levels in the game, sorted from Z to A level, with Z level being the lowest and A level being the highest.
  • Rare Description : Each level of treasure pearl has a rarity of 1 to 9 stars, and the more stars there are, the more precious the treasure bead is.
  • Probability distribution : The probability of obtaining 1-9 star pearl when opening the treasure chest decreases in the following order: 20%, 18%, 16%, 14%, 12%, 8%, 6%, 4%, 2%.
  • Social Interaction : Invite friends to join the game, experience the fun of collecting together, and quickly obtain the gems you need through the exchange system.

🌟 Winner In Life: Free Leisure Collection Game 🌟


Game features:
  • The treasure chest : Every two minutes, you will receive a mysterious treasure chest. Opening it will randomly give you a beautiful pearl which can be traded in the community!
  • Pearl Upgrade : 4 identical pearls can be combined to create a higher-level pearl, making your collection more diverse.
  • Level Description : There are a total of 26 levels in the game, sorted from Z to A level, with Z level being the lowest and A level being the highest.
  • Rare Description : Each level of treasure pearl has a rarity of 1 to 9 stars, and the more stars there are, the more precious the treasure bead is.
  • Probability distribution : The probability of obtaining 1-9 star pearl when opening the treasure chest decreases in the following order: 20%, 18%, 16%, 14%, 12%, 8%, 6%, 4%, 2%.
  • Social Interaction : Invite friends to join the game, experience the fun of collecting together, and quickly obtain the gems you need through the exchange system.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Natively supports any Intel or Apple Silicon processor.
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 14.5
  • Processor: Natively supports any Intel or Apple Silicon processor.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: This is a free, casual item collection game. Every two minutes you will get a treasure chest. Opening it will randomly give you a beautiful pearl. 4 identical pearls can be combined to create a higher-level pearl. You can exchange the pearls you need with your friends
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
